taskbody.context: This operation is used to transfer/install source and data files into the remote site. Follow the below steps to trigger this operation.

step.cmd: Right-click on a folder, select T24 Basic -> Sync To T24 from Navigator view.
Once the action is triggered, the following dialog will appear.
Remote site refers to a T24 site created through
Source Item Directory refers to the Server Directory in the remote site. Eg. BP
Operation Type refers to the type of operation to be performed.

choices.choice: Transfer: Transfers the data and source files into source Item Directory of the remote site. The file structure of the plug-in will be maintained at the remote site.

Install: Transfers all the source files into source Item Directory of remote site and performs compilation.For data files,transfers the files into ../DIM.TEMP/DATA directory of the remote site and releases the items there.
